# Source code dev comment types

```
// -DEPRECIATED- %optional-note%
// %code%

or 

/* -DEPRECIATED- %optional-note%
%code%
*/
```

```
// #DEVNOTE#
// %note%

or

/* #DEVNOTE#
%note%
*/
```

```
// !IMPORTANT!
// %note%

or 

/* !IMPORTANT!
%note%
*/
```

```
// {REFACTOR}
// %note%

or 

/* {REFACTOR}
%note%
*/
```

```
// @TODO@
// %note%

or

/* @TODO@
%note%
*/
```
